professional_summary: Database Administrator with expertise in Oracle and Microsoft SQL Server databases, experienced in database management, migrations, backups, security, and data transfers using various tools and software.

key_responsibilities: Installed and maintained Oracle 11g/12c clustered RAC databases using UNIX(AIX).
Created standby databases using Data Guard and upgraded databases to 12c.
Conducted basic queries in Microsoft SQL Server.

Bachelor of Science in International Business
